messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whats up fuckers its me again this  is youre captin speakin

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Nick Freeman. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. An ERT has been dispatched. We will also be setting off the nuke. Most likely.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Unknown. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. The nuclear codes have been authorized. All staff is advised to destroy the station to prevent the spread of the sentient expansive organism.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
